entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 11.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Partly cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
